original_text: At one time, you were slaves to sin. But then you received God's true message, and you were happy to obey it. I thank God because of that!
korean_text: 하나님께 감사하리로다 너희가 본래 죄의 종이더니 너희에게 전하여 준 바 교훈의 본을 마음으로 순종하여

sentences.original_text: At one time, you were slaves to sin.
But then you received God's true message,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 후 너희는 하나님의 참된 메시지를 받았고,

sentences.original_text: and you were happy to obey it.
I thank God because of that!
